summary: So my dad is my personal trainer at the moment, and to increase my motivation he has started labelling different workouts with...
body:
So my dad is my personal trainer at the moment, and to increase my motivation he has started labelling different workouts with the names of marvel characters. Today I was doing his ‘Winter Soldier workout’ (the work out that up until now I believed to be the hardest) and when I started complaining he said:


Dad: you’re complaining about this and I haven’t even started you on the black widow Work out yet


Me: … wait that’s harder than the others?


Dad: she could kill everyone in those movies without breaking a sweat. Now shut up and finish your set.


Now I don’t know about you but the fact a 6’4, heavily tattooed, professional sportsman like my dad held a female superhero at the peak of his workout list instead of someone like Thor is pretty cool to me :’)

tags: a song of ice and fire
title: Q&A
body:
Rules: answer 30 questions and tag 10 blogs you would like to get to know better.

Tagged by @tomakeitbeautifultolive @thescarletgarden1990

• Nickname(s): Mim.

• Gender: Female.

• Sign: Scorpio.

• Height: 1,60 cm.

• Time: 21.01 (UTC -3)

• Fav band(s): I never know what to answer, I love so many bands of so many different styles, let’s say: The Beatles, Mumfords and Sons, Coldplay, (and many many others I can’t think of right now…).

• Fav solo artist(s): Same here, damn… Let’s say Frank Sinatra, I’m inspired from Emilia’s singing LOL I do love his songs. Oh, and 

• Song stuck in my head: Corazón Partio by Alejandro Sans with Ivete Sangalo

• Last movie I saw: Ant Man and The Wasp, LOVED IT. Also, just rewatched The Mummy, if it’s on It’s mandatory to watch. 

THE REAL MUMMY, YOU HEAR ME TOM CRUISE? It’s always time to watch myself some Evelyn and Rick <3

• Last show I watched: Currently addicted to B99, considering watching The Bold Type.

• When did I create this blog: Halfway through season 7. Thank the Gods that I did, I get to ship my ship with a bunch of awesome people here. <3 
ALSO: FANFICS. Damn, I love it.

• What do I post: Jonerys, All ASOIAF especially asoiaf history like Targs of old, House Dayne (yes, I’m obsessed), House Blackwood and Stark. Also, Marvel stuff. I’m a geek, it’s inevitable some DC and Marvel. Plus, lots of some good feminism and literature. 

• Last thing I googled: How to write ‘asshole’ in high valyrian. Couldn’t find. Anyone?

• Do I have any other blogs: Yes, my main one and an actual fashion blog. :D

• Do I get asks: Unfortunally a bunch of negative ones lately so I do appreciate any nice ones. I do love getting asks, but I’d prefer some positive ones. I did get a nice one earlier today, thanks for that one, anon. You guys can always ask me stuff, when I’m around I love to answer it. 

• Why did I choose my URL: toaquiprashippar means ‘I’m here to ship it’, this is my safe space to ship all my ships and let the obsession run free. What a bless. 

• Following: Some great people. 

• Followed by: Some awesome people. 

• Average hours of sleep: Honestly? Around 5 or 6 when I’m working or mom wakes me up early (considering I usually sleep very late, I’m a night owl!) and next to 7/8 whenever I can.

• Lucky number: 13 and 2. Dunno, don’t ask. They just seem to bring me luck.

• Instruments: Not one, I tried guittar, but apparently I suck on it. But I can sing, does that count for anything? 

• What I am wearing: Denim shorts and a blue gym top. It’s really hot here right now. 

• Dream trip: Wherever I can see the Northern Lights, but even though you can’t see it there, I can say any trip to London is a dreamy one, I love that place. 

• Fav food: Italian and Japonese. Either one, I’m in. Also, brazilian food damn a good feijoada, am I right?

• Nationality: Brazilian :D

• Fav song: One does not have a favorite song, come on. But right now? ‘Girls Like You’ by Maroon 5 and ‘Sons and Daughters’ by Allman Brown & Liz Lawrence

• Last book I read: A Game Of Thrones, currently reading A Clash Of Kings. Started reading everything all over again, blame it on the abstinence. 

• Currently reading: Ops, up there. A Clash Of Kings by George RR Martin.

• Top 3 universes I wanna join: Not sure if it’s actually healthy to join Westeros but damn I would love to be a dragonrider Targaryen, or a Stark warg. LOL 
Marvel, can I be an mutant Avenger, please? I just want to be buddies with Tony Stark and have powers to save the world. 
Also, Harry Potter. If you don’t, you’re not a child of the 90′s.

Tagging: I do think everyone has answered it before but if not, and do feel free to not answer again, @ktwrites @fairytalelovr @filhadoboto @northernlights37@thescarletgarden1990 @dathorninthenorth @charlie-leau @winelover1989  @muttpeeta @zeetao-hime (sorry if I forgot someone, my memory sucks.)

blog.name: writing-in-winter
blog.title: avery
blog.description:
a pisces ravenclaw writer

i love you three thousand, tony stark
requests are open! | prompt list masterlist
main;mala-firebringer

title: your love (drabble)
body:
pairing: tony x reader

warnings: some descriptions of a troubled family, fluff in general

word count: 676

A/N: I’m feeling so soft lately and this just happened! Feedback is much appreciated and my ask box is open for requests (mainly Tony and Bucky, but you can send in other Marvel characters and I will see what I can do!) Thanks for reading :)

You wake up to the soft rays of sunlight streaming in through the translucent curtain and the weight of an arm over your waist. Gently turning around as to not wake Tony up, you lightly snake your arms around his neck and bury your face in the crook of his neck. A faint scent of whiskey and sandalwood surrounded you, no doubt thanks to the glass of whiskey he had nursed last night.

Home. Right here in Tony’s arms, you are home.

You grew up with a strict and stoic father figure and a relaxed yet fussy mother. Like Tony, you entered your teenage years, looking to your father for anything, a word of praise or encouragement for your achievements, only to be met with more comments and comparisons to others. Although, that was the least of your problems, considering the fact that he had cheated on your mother on multiple occasions and she still stayed for you and your brother, resulting in an easily irritable family and arguments being a common household activity. For the last few years of staying with your parents, you constantly had to pull on a mask and tip toe around them when speaking because a mistake will send your parents into argument hour. You hated it. Hated the insincerity of the place and its people.

Your childhood left you wanting to be better for your children. And now, you are going to have one of your own with the love of your life.

You wish you could go back and tell your younger self of the man who loves you with every fibre of his being, and tell her to stop chasing after the boys who didn’t matter. So that her heart wasn’t broken over and over again by boys who did not recognise her value or appreciate the enormity of her love. If only she could have saved all her love for this man sleeping beside her peacefully, his heartbeat a steady rhythm against your ribcage.

Like every morning, Tony greets you with a kiss on your forehead and tugging you even closer to him. You smile against his skin, fingers moving north to brush through his dark hair. His fingers slip under his shirt that you had on, drawing soothing circles on your back. Both of you equally love the few minutes between sleep and getting up for the day, which were filled with these silent moments of touch and affection, and more often than not, you both just laze around in bed for at least half an hour.

Tony had admitted to you that he is touch starved after several months of dating and you’d be lying if you said you weren’t. Instead, you just pulled him in for a long tight hug, one arm around his back and fingers tangled in his hair, and he was holding onto you just as tight. You think you stood there for a solid ten minutes before FRIDAY interrupted the comfortable silence, saying that Tony is needed downstairs in the conference room. You made it a point to grab on to his hand and tell him that you were just as touch starved as he was, if not more, before he left.

Finally satisfied by his scent, you lift your head to plant a soft sleepy kiss on his lips. Once, twice, thrice. Morning kisses aren’t lust-filled most of the time. There was no rush, no need or chase for a release. Just innocence and love, free of your duties and worries. Mornings in bed, you are just (Y/N) and Tony, nothing more than two people being madly in love.

“Morning, love.” Tony smiles at you with a sparkle in his chocolate eyes. Your heart soars, just like it does every time he calls you love. And just like it did when he went down on one knee and ended his speech by calling you his love. And in that moment, you just knew you are going to spend the rest of your life with this man. Your love.

tag(s): @lilyrosebae

reblog.comment:
pairing: tony x reader

warnings: some descriptions of a troubled family, fluff in general

word count: 676

Gently turning around as to not wake Tony up, you lightly snake your arms around his neck and bury your face in the crook of his neck. A faint scent of whiskey and sandalwood surrounded you, no doubt thanks to the glass of whiskey he had nursed last night.

Home. Right here in Tony’s arms, you are home.

You grew up with a strict and stoic father figure and a relaxed yet fussy mother. Like Tony, you entered your teenage years, looking to your father for anything, a word of praise or encouragement for your achievements, only to be met with more comments and comparisons to others. Although, that was the least of your problems, considering the fact that he had cheated on your mother on multiple occasions and she still stayed for you and your brother, resulting in an easily irritable family and arguments being a common household activity. For the last few years of staying with your parents, you constantly had to pull on a mask and tip toe around them when speaking because a mistake will send your parents into argument hour. You hated it. Hated the insincerity of the place and its people.

Your childhood left you wanting to be better for your children. And now, you are going to have one of your own with the love of your life.

You wish you could go back and tell your younger self of the man who loves you with every fibre of his being, and tell her to stop chasing after the boys who didn’t matter. So that her heart wasn’t broken over and over again by boys who did not recognise her value or appreciate the enormity of her love. If only she could have saved all her love for this man sleeping beside her peacefully, his heartbeat a steady rhythm against your ribcage.

Like every morning, Tony greets you with a kiss on your forehead and tugging you even closer to him. You smile against his skin, fingers moving north to brush through his dark hair. His fingers slip under his shirt that you had on, drawing soothing circles on your back. Both of you equally love the few minutes between sleep and getting up for the day, which were filled with these silent moments of touch and affection, and more often than not, you both just laze around in bed for at least half an hour.

Tony had admitted to you that he is touch starved after several months of dating and you’d be lying if you said you weren’t. Instead, you just pulled him in for a long tight hug, one arm around his back and fingers tangled in his hair, and he was holding onto you just as tight. You think you stood there for a solid ten minutes before FRIDAY interrupted the comfortable silence, saying that Tony is needed downstairs in the conference room. You made it a point to grab on to his hand and tell him that you were just as touch starved as he was, if not more, before he left.

Finally satisfied by his scent, you lift your head to plant a soft sleepy kiss on his lips. Once, twice, thrice. Morning kisses aren’t lust-filled most of the time. There was no rush, no need or chase for a release. Just innocence and love, free of your duties and worries. Mornings in bed, you are just (Y/N) and Tony, nothing more than two people being madly in love.

“Morning, love.” Tony smiles at you with a sparkle in his chocolate eyes. Your heart soars, just like it does every time he calls you love. And just like it did when he went down on one knee and ended his speech by calling you his love. And in that moment, you just knew you are going to spend the rest of your life with this man. Your love.

tag(s): @lilyrosebae

pairing: tony x reader

warnings: some descriptions of a troubled family, fluff in general

word count: 676

blog.description: Not-fitz is actually my account, please stop following this one, it makes me feel like I gotta post here

summary:
Captain America Civil War was a representation of two sides of Anxiety. Let me explain:
Iron Man: He was sickened by what...
body:
Captain America Civil War was a representation of two sides of Anxiety. Let me explain:

Iron Man: He was sickened by what happened in Sokovia and wanted it to stop, he wanted to be kept under control because of the amount of people that died, what really pushed him over the edge was the mother speaking of her son.

This is the fear of mistakes in the past might create new problems in the future.

Captain America: Saw what happened with Ultron and realised that there are stronger things than them in the Universe and wanted free reign to stop them. He was afraid that he would lose everything again because he wasn’t powerful enough to save it, even if he didn’t want to admit it himself.

This is the constant fear of a future problem that may never come to pass. And the need to be strong enough to overcome it without thinking of yourself.

This is what tore the team apart, the fact that they all had different worries and self problems that they just couldn’t overcome. The idea of the Accords just pushed them enough to the problem for them to realise it was there but they couldn’t see it.

I haven’t posted Marvel in a while, holy shit

summary:
If y’all are going to associate disney characters with marvel characters, at least do it right.
Elsa- Thor(Goofball, heir to the...
body:
If y’all are going to associate disney characters with marvel characters, at least do it right.

Elsa- Thor(Goofball, heir to the throne, banishment, the more lavished child.)

Anna- Loki(Neglected, views self as lesser sibling, sacrificed self to save older sibling, ie Anna throwing herself between Hans & Elsa and Loki giving up the tessaract to save Thor.)

Belle- Tony(Inventor, hunger for learning, sarcastic)

Tiana- Sam(Hard worker, The sensible one.)

Rapunzel- Steve(Self sacrificing, an artist, gets into scraps she doesn’t need to.)

Eugene- Peggy(Helped with big mission, half the impulse control, in love with the other.)

Ariel- Either Dr. Banner or Aunt May depending on which movie. (Curious by nature, big physical changes, highly inteligent.) (motherly, doesn’t put up with child’s bullheadedness, everyone’s favorite mom)

Melody- Peter(Smart, snarky, goes behind mother figure’s back to do secretive things)

Kida- T’challa(Inherited throne because a white man with an agenda killed father, doesn’t put up with white nonsense(could apply to Tiana), Agility like whoa)

Mulan- Maria (duty driven, smart, best damn agent Fury has, hilarious as hell)

If y’all are going to associate disney characters with marvel characters, at least do it right.

Elsa- Thor(Goofball, heir to the throne, banishment, the more lavished child.)

Anna- Loki(Neglected, views self as lesser sibling, sacrificed self to save older sibling, ie Anna throwing herself between Hans & Elsa and Loki giving up the tessaract to save Thor.)

Belle- Tony(Inventor, hunger for learning, sarcastic)

Tiana- Sam(Hard worker, The sensible one.)

Rapunzel- Steve(Self sacrificing, an artist, gets into scraps she doesn’t need to.)

Eugene- Peggy(Helped with big mission, half the impulse control, in love with the other.)

Ariel- Either Dr. Banner or Aunt May depending on which movie. (Curious by nature, big physical changes, highly inteligent.) (motherly, doesn’t put up with child’s bullheadedness, everyone’s favorite mom)

Melody- Peter(Smart, snarky, goes behind mother figure’s back to do secretive things)

Kida- T’challa(Inherited throne because a white man with an agenda killed father, doesn’t put up with white nonsense(could apply to Tiana), Agility like whoa)

Mulan- Maria (duty driven, smart, best damn agent Fury has, hilarious as hell)

reblog.comment: It will be live
